entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
